column2: While many struggle to see why [Religion.GetHighGodName] decided to take a young child away from us, we hope [GetFirstName] will find peace in the afterlife

column2: For [GetHerHis] wicked deeds, many screamed not to bury [GetFirstName] with the other rulers of our lands, instead to toss [GetHerHim] in an unmarked grave and without the proper services. May [GetFirstName] finally pay for [GetHerHis] sins in the afterlife
